testsuite.name: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: And I choose creating new Group from the Create New button in the "Questions" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: Then I see the "Add Group" dialog open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: When I enter a group name of "Test Add"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: And I click the "Add Group" dialog button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: Then I am on the Content Repository page with the "Questions" column open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: Then Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "Add Content"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: Then I see that I am on the Content Repository page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: When I expand the "Text" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: And I select the question by name "Add Content"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: And I click the "Add to" button in the bulk row
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: Then I see the "Add to" dialog open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: When I select the "Test Add" group in the dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: And I click the "Add to" dialog button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.name: Then I see the "Add to complete" dialog open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group

testcase.classname: Scenario: Add content to a group
